title: Had To Repair now its stuck
body:
okay so i did my normal thing i do when the newest patch comes out rush home from school and start the patcher then go out. 2 hours later when i got home i sawq a pop up about some bugsplat.ll now today i have come to try patch it worked  i tryed to load into a custom game to test ping cos we all know oce is really bad for ping. and i got thrown to the reconnect screen then my game crashed now i am doing the repair it is frozen  at 99% step 2 5.89mb 642KBps 


PLZ HELP I LOVE THIS GAME

replies.body:
Has this issue resolved itself now?

Sometimes the patcher will seem to be "Stuck" but it's really just doing it's job, you should let it run until completion.
